q: Simon Cowell may court Paula Abdul for X Factor panel Simon Cowell wants his new Fox talent series The X Factor to include controversy, vocal groups and, maybe, Paula Abdul on the judging panel. We've spoken to her, she knows I'm a big fan, Simon Cowell said of his former fellow American Idol judge. "I've always said at some point we are going to be working together." the fantastic group of juniors he has for 2011. His senior defensive end/linebacker Jarrell McKinney signed with Western Michigan. "He's my first Division I recruit," Norman said of McKinney. He has tremendous speed. He runs the 40 in 4.5. He's 6-5, 210, and when he goes to college they're going to put another 20-30 pounds on him. Playing defensive end, he's going to be outstanding. He's the role model for our other kids.... He's that bar that we have to set for ourselves. Cody has an experienced offensive line and receivers coming back, and Norman said junior-to-be quarterback Mario Gulley "has Michael Vick capabilities."
